channel.title: Authors on Power Platform Tips & Tricks
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Power Platform Tips & Tricks

item.title: Authors
item.description: Who am I?I’ve started this site to share the knowledge I’ve gained as a Power Platform Developer. Being a former hairdresser, turned IT, no coding background, no degree and self-taught on most things, I feel it’s important to share the knowledge, so others can also learn from it. Me at the Power Platform Conference in Orlando Florida, 2022 We’re all in this journey together, my motto is, if you can do it, so can I and vice versa.
